summary:
Agrega texturas nuevas al mod "DMC 3 and 4 Weapons"

Add new textures to the mod "DMC 3 and 4 Weapons"
descriptionHtml:
Espa√±ol:Simplemente agrega nuevas texturas a las armas Agni & Rudra del mod "[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6290]DMC 3 and 4 Weapons[/url]" para hacerlas entrar mas en ambiente con Skyrim. ojala alguien pudiera conventirlas al modo Dual Sheath.

English: Simply add new textures to the Agni & Rudra weapons of the mod "[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6290]DMC 3 and 4 Weapons[/url]" to make them enter more into the environment with Skyrim. I wish someone could convent them to Dual Sheath mode.
